General.Name: Xiangyang Changyuan Donggu Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiangyang Changyuandonggu Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of diesel engine components. It primarily offers cylinder blocks and heads, flywheel housings, connecting rods, main bearing caps, gear chambers, gearbox housings, exhaust pipes, gear room products, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xiangyang, China.
